Posts.Content: Hi!  I was diagnosed with MCBC Nov2016. How is your sister doing?  I pray well.  I had chemo, the surgery (both breasts) and now radiation everyday for 7 weeks.  We fight together!  I also would like to connect with other MBC fighters...prognosis seems less than positive, so we gotta stick together!
Posts.Title: Invasive Metaplastic Carcinoma breast cancer
